summary: Build a responsive, fully client-side Receipt Generator Web App for AUTO ELITE PRIVATE LIMITED that generates print-ready A4 PDFs containing two identical receipt copies per page, with professional minimal styling, multi-payment support, and optional logo upload/print preview.
architectural_notes: Tech stack: HTML/CSS/JavaScript; fully client-side (no backend).
PDF generation library: jsPDF or html2pdf.
PDF output must be A4 with two identical receipt copies per page (print-optimized).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal monochrome ATHER-style wordmark logo on transparent background (ather-logo.dim_900x240.png)

existing_features.title: Build a responsive Receipt Generator single-page UI with an input form containing: locked Company Name prefilled as “AUTO ELITE PRIVATE LIMITED”, Customer Name, Order Number, auto-generated Receipt Number, auto-filled Date (editable only if user changes it), and a Payments section that supports multiple payment entries.
Auto-calculate and display Total Amount as the sum of all payment entry amounts, updating immediately as entries are added/removed/edited, and validate that amounts are non-negative numbers.

Create a print-friendly receipt preview component that renders a clean, professional, premium, minimal receipt layout including: company header with logo, company name, receipt metadata (receipt number/date/order number/customer name), a clearly formatted payment breakdown table, total amount, and a footer with an authorized signature line.

Implement one-click client-side PDF generation (using jsPDF or html2pdf) that produces a print-ready A4 PDF containing two identical copies of the same receipt on a single A4 page, aligned cleanly with print-friendly margins and optional cut/separator line between copies.
Add a Print Preview mode that shows exactly how the A4 page will be printed, including both identical receipt copies on a single page, before generating/downloading the PDF.

Support an editable company logo upload workflow: show a default ATHER logo in the header, allow the user to upload a replacement image (PNG/JPG/SVG if supported), and use the selected logo in both the receipt preview and generated PDF.

Implement auto receipt number generation with a clear, deterministic format suitable for business use (e.g., date-based + sequence or timestamp-based), and ensure the number stays stable for the current receipt unless the user explicitly resets/creates a new receipt.

Apply a coherent, premium, minimal visual theme across the app (form, preview, buttons) using a white base, charcoal/ink text, and a restrained accent color (avoid blue/purple), with print-friendly typography and spacing.
Ensure all user-facing text is in English throughout the application UI and the generated receipt/PDF.
Do not require any backend persistence for receipt data; the app must function fully client-side for editing, previewing, and generating PDFs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create responsive receipt generator UI with input form (locked company name, customer name, order number, auto receipt number, auto date, payment mode) and auto-calculated total
Support dynamic multiple payment entries (add/remove) with payment mode, amount, and UTR/transaction number; show formatted payment breakdown on receipt
Generate downloadable/print-ready A4 PDF with two identical receipt copies on a single page, including company header with ATHER logo, clean layout, borders, and signature line
Implement one-click Generate PDF and print preview mode optimized for A4 margins and crisp typography
Add auto receipt number generation logic
Allow editable company logo upload (default ATHER logo) for receipt header
